unnormalised: Bara, tum sorkarant kam korchea vixim chinttai, h√£? Vo fuddem bhonvpi soglle toreche *babu* vixim tumkam fokot utsuktai asa. Bhartant aikunk mellpi kaim sadharan sorkari ani prashasanik padveanchi vichar koruya. Thoddo avghad asta, mhaka khobor asa!
normalised: Boro, tor tum sarkarant kam korpacho vichar kortat, ho? Vo tum fokot bhonvtonni firtat tea vegveglea babunchi utsuktai asa tumkam. Bharotant tumkam aikunk melltoleo kaim sadhea sarkar ani prashasnik padanchi mahiti gheuya. Tem thodem gunthanchem asunk xakta, mhaka khobor asa!

unnormalised: Poilim, tumkam kiteakui "DM" vo "District Magistrate" hea vixim aikunk mellta. Te mullant tanchea jil'leache raz asat, kanoon ani vyavasthethaun utpon'n zoma korchea poriant soglleank zapsardar asat. Thoinchea lokank zai tea samasyek ut'tor divpi mhonn chint. Uprant "SDM" vo Sub-Divisional Magistrate asa. Te DM-chea uzve vattencho monis asat, jil'leachea ek lhan bhagachi dekhrekh kortat.
normalised: Poileanch, tumkam "D-M" vo "District Magistrate" oxem borech pavtti aikunk yeta. Te mukhya rupan tanchea jil'leache raz astat, kanoon ani vyovostha thavn utponn ekvotthay korchea poriant sogllea vostunk zapsardar astat. Tanchi thoinch jiyetat tea lokam khatir ultima problem-solver mhonn chintat. Uprant "S-D-M" vo Sub-Divisional Magistrate asta. Te D-M-chea uzvea hatachem monis asat, jil'leachea ek lhan bhagachi dekhrekh kortat.

unnormalised: Uprant amchea kodden "IAS officer" asa. Tem ek vhoddlem! IAS officer zaunk zain mhonnpachi zatryam zal'leanchi sopon asta ani UPSC porixa spasht korchi poddta. IAS officer aplea jivitbhar DM thaun Bharot sorkaracho Secretary poriant veglleo podveo samballunk xakta. Te unchlea patllecher niti ghoddovpant ani akar divpant bhag ghetat. Tumkam "IPS officer" - Indian Police Service-achi khobor melltole, te raj ani raxttriya patllecher kanoon ani vyavasta samballunk zapsardar astat. *DCP* Aisha Sharma vo *SP* Rakesh Kumar mhonn chint - tumi tankam khobreant poileam astole.
normalised: Uprant amchea kodden "I-A-S officer" astat. Tem ek vhoddlem zavn asa! I-A-S officer zaunk boreank ek sopon asta ani taka U-P-S-C porixa pass korchi poddtta. I-A-S officer aplea kariera bhitor boreoch pozishn dhorunk xaktat, D-M thavn Bharot sorkarachea Secretary poriant. Te unchlea panchvechea panchvecher niti nirman korpache ani amlant haddpache kamant gumtlele astat. Tumkam "I-P-S officer" vixoyantui aikunk yeta - Bharoti Pulise Seva. Te rajya ani rastriya panvddecher kanoon ani vyovostha sambhallpak zapsardar astat. D-C-P Aisha Sharma vo S-P Rakesh Kumar mhonn chintat - tumi tankam khobramni pollele astole.

unnormalised: Vegllege "Secretaries" amkam visrunk favona. Sorkaracho ek Secretary ek vixixtt montraloy vo vibhagak zapsardar aslolea unch padvecho odhikari. Udharonnak, "Home Secretary" ghara karyalaya vixim dekhrekh korta, bhitarli suraksha dekhrekh korta. Uprant Additional Secretaries, Joint Secretaries ani oxem fuddem vhortat - dor ekachechya apleach vixixtt zapsalyo ani odhikarik patlleo astat.
normalised: Vegveglea "Secretary" ani visronaka. Sorkaracho Secretary ek khas mantralaya vo vibhagak zapsardar unch-rankingacho odhikari asta. Udharonnak, "Home Secretary" ontorgot suraksha sambhallpachea Home Ministry-che dekhrekh kortat. Uprant Additional Secretaries, Joint Secretaries ani oxech tola khala - dor ekeacheo apleacheo khas zapsandari ani odhikarachi panvddi asta.

unnormalised: Thollavea patllecher, tumkam "Sarpanch" bhaxen padveo melltoleo. Sarpanch ek Gram Panchayat-echo (ganv ponchayat) nivddun kadlolea mukheli asta. Te ganvcho avaz astat ani thollavea vikasak zapsardar astat. Zaite pavtti lok tankam "Sarpanch Ji" mhonn ulo kortat. Uprant "Tehsildar" asa, zo tehsil patllecher zominichea nondichi ani utpon'n zoma korpaichi dekhrekh korta.
normalised: Lokal panvddecher tumkam "Sarpanch" oxi title melltta. Sarpanch ek Gram Panchayat-acho (ganv mandoll) vinchlololo mukheli asta. Te ganvacho avaz astat ani lokal vikasak zapsardar astat. Borech pavtti lok tankam "Sarpanch Ji" mhonn vollaitat. Uprant "Tehsildar" asta, zo tehsil panvddecher zomeeniche rekord sambhalltta ani utponn ekvotthay korta.

unnormalised: Ani tumkam ek pramanpotr vo koslea tori odhikrut kagdok zai tevhann kiteak? Thoim "Block Development Officer" vo "BDO" yeta. Te block patllecher vikas karyakromanche akar divpavixin dekhrekh kortat ani tumchea prashasanik vostunchea bhara khatir tumcho yevpi monis asta. Khub sadharonnponnan tumi "Collector" hem utor vaportole - khasgi korun DM, purannea kagdot.
normalised: Ani tumkam zohna ek certificate vo kaim odhikrut kagodpotram zai asta? Thoinch "Block Development Officer" vo "B-D-O" yetat. Te block panvddecher vikas karyakramache amolbajavnicher dekhrekh kortat ani boreoch prashasnik vostunk tumchea go-to person astat. Khub sadhern tumkam lok "Collector" uloitana aikunk yeta - borech pavtti D-M-khatir badlapalot zaunk, khas korun poryea kagodpotramni.

unnormalised: Xevttim, kaim rajki padveanchi ulayauya. "MLA" mhollear Member of the Legislative Assembly. Tankam rajya vidhan sobhent nivddun kaddtat, mhojea vattharantlea Mr. Patel bhaxen. Ani khorench, "MP" vo Member of Parliament asa, zo raxttriya sonsodent tanchea vixvathleanchem protinidhitva korta. Hi padveanchi vollokh zalear tumkam bharti sorkar koso kam korta ani bharti prashasanant konn konn asa tem borem somzunk adar kortolem. Mhonnchek fuddlea pavtti konnem tori "The Chief Secretary-n prastavak manyotai dili," mhonn sangit zalear, tumkam te kiteak ulaita tem thauk astelem!
normalised: Nimanni, kaim rajki title vixoyant ulouya. "M-L-A" mhonnlear Member of the Legislative Assembly. Te rajya vidhan sabhent vinchun kaddtat, mhojea area thavn Mister Patel bhaxen. Ani nischit rupan, "M-P" vo Member of Parliament, zo rastriya parliamentant aplea constituency-chem pratinidhitv korta. He title zanno zaun tumkam Bharoti sorkar koso kam korta hem somzunk madot melltta ani Bharoti prashasnacho duniyaent konn konn asa hem somzunk madot melltta. Mhonnun porti tumi konnak tori "Chief Secretary-n proposal-ak manyatai dili" mhonn aikot, tumkam te kitachi gollak kortat hem purai ritin kolltolem!
